page.title: 04Farming in Atterton
page.content:
My father is called Roger, and he is a farmer. His brother is also a farmer. His name is Walter. My dad gets up at 6.00 am, and starts work at 7.00 am. Roger has his own farm up at Atterton.
Walter has his own farm down at Witherley. He works mostly in the milking parlour down at Witherley.
We milk our cows twice a day, morning and night. We have got 43 milking cows, 1 bull and 160 other cattle.
We feed our cows with hay every morning in the summer.In the winter we give the cows silage.
We give our chickens corn, and our ducks too. The geese have corn as well The little chicks have chick pellets.
